Package nars.io

Input/output management

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Input<X>
    Provides input for the next moment from an input channel that delivers input asynchronously
    Output
    Output Channel: Implements this and NAR.addOutput(..) to receive output signals on various channels
    Output.Channel  
    Output.ECHO
    explicitly repeated input (repetition of the content of input ECHO commands)
    Output.ERR
    warnings, errors & exceptions
    Output.EXE
    operation execution
    Output.IN
    implicitly repeated input (a repetition of all input)
    Output.OUT
    conversational (judgments, questions, etc...) output
    TextOutput.LineOutput  
    TextReaction
    A low-level handler for parsing text.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultTextPerception
    Default handlers for text perception
    Symbols  
    Termize
    Utilities for encoding/escaping and decoding/unescaping Terms
    TextInput
    To read and write experience as Task streams
    TextOutput
    To read and write experience as Task streams
    TextPerception
    Processes text input
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Symbols.NativeOperator  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TextPerception.InvalidInputException
    All kinds of invalid addInput lines

Package nars.io Description

Input/output management

Package Specification

All Narsese-based input/output interfaces of the system are defined in this package.
